verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You opened the gate to a brand new life
When I came to the altar;
You opened the door
And Your Spirit filled me through and through;
But now my heart still longs for something deeper,
And I can see light through a veil
That You have torn in two.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I want to break through,
I want to break through;
To know as I'm known, to know You alone,
I want to break through.
To where no sin may stand in the way,
Let me enter in with boldness, I pray,
Show me Thy glory, show me Thy way,
I want to break through.
